sentences.simplifiedText: 为了更好地解决实际问题，我正在学习如何应用统计学。
sentences.traditionalText: 為了更好地解決實際問題，我正在學習如何應用統計學。
sentences.pinyin: Wèile gèng hǎo de jiějué shíjì wèntí, wǒ zhèngzài xuéxí rúhé yìngyòng tǒngjì xué.
sentences.translation: In order to better solve practical problems, I am learning how to apply statistics.

sentences.pinyin: wǒ xū yào tǒng jì suǒ yǒu de shù.
sentences.translation: I need to add up all the numbers.

sentences.simplifiedText: 为了制定财务预算，我们必须先统计所有的支出和收入。
sentences.traditionalText: 為了制定財務預算，我們必須先統計所有的支出和收入。
sentences.pinyin: wèi le zhì dìng cái wù yù suàn , wǒ men bì xū xiān tǒng jì suǒ yǒu de zhī chū hé shōu rù.
sentences.translation: In order to formulate the budget, we must first add up all the expenses and income.
